generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings, which is the primary surface for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There is a paved area alongside the road, separated by a curb, where pedestrians and cyclists are present.
- building: A large building with windows is visible in the background on the right side of the image.
- fence: A white fence is visible along the right side of the image, running parallel to the sidewalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible at an intersection ahead, showing red.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a triangular warning sign and a stop sign.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and greenery are visible along the road and sidewalks.
- terrain: Grass and other vegetation are visible on the sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: Several people are visible on the sidewalk, including pedestrians and cyclists.
- rider: Several individuals are riding bicycles on the sidewalk.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including sedans and vans.
- truck: There are no trucks visible in the image.
- bus: There are no buses visible in the image.
- train: There are no trains visible in the image.
- motorcycle: There are no motorcycles visible in the image.
